definition: to retreat/to decline/to move back/to withdraw
squad of five soldiers/to associate with/five (banker's anti-fraud numeral)

sentences.english: Today, more than 850,000 veterans remain unemployed.
sentences.chinese: 今天，超過85萬退伍軍人仍在失業。

sentences.english: But what of the combat veterans who don't suffer from PTSD?
sentences.chinese: 但那些沒有患上PTSD的退伍軍人情況又是怎樣呢？

sentences.english: The healthcare information system was developed by the US Veterans Affairs.
sentences.chinese: 保健信息系統是由美國退伍軍人事務處開發的。

sentences.english: ROBINSON Alright collect taxes through the Treasury. Veteran's Affairs?
sentences.chinese: 通過財政部收稅，好。退伍軍人事務部？

sentences.english: The demobilized soldier deserves a special treatment for his being disabled.
sentences.chinese: 這名退伍軍人因爲喪失能力而應該受到特殊待遇。

sentences.english: Veterans from around the world had surmounted one more unprecedented challenge.
sentences.chinese: 來自世界各地的退伍軍人顯然又是一個空前挑戰。

sentences.english: Today, more than 850, 000 veterans remain unemployed.
sentences.chinese: 今天，有85萬多退伍軍人還處在失業之中。

sentences.english: The ex-servicemen's main grievance is the difficulty of settling back into civilian life.
sentences.chinese: 退伍軍人的主要訴求是解決退伍安置的問題。

sentences.english: There were tributes and parades to honor the veterans.
sentences.chinese: 有向退伍軍人致敬的活動和遊行。

sentences.english: Today, more than 850,000 veterans remain unemployed.
sentences.chinese: 今天，850000多名退伍軍人仍然失業。

sentences.english: And you, Mr. Veteran, you must have been often wounded?
sentences.chinese: 您呢，退伍軍人先生，您總免不了要常常掛點彩吧。

sentences.english: There are currently about 25 million veterans still living.
sentences.chinese: 目前美國大約還有兩千五百萬名退伍軍人健在。

sentences.english: A veteran's prosthesis: he was once in love with his doctor.
sentences.chinese: 一位退伍軍人的義肢，他曾與自己的復健師相戀。

sentences.english: Veterans are eligible for free medical treatments at the veterans' hospital.
sentences.chinese: 退伍軍人在榮民醫院可享有免費醫療。

sentences.english: Heis also a decorated veteran of the Vietnam War.
sentences.chinese: 他也是一名擁有越戰勳章的退伍軍人。

definition: variant of 弗吉尼亞州|弗吉尼亚州/Virginia, US state

pinyin: Nuo4 bei4 er3 He2 ping2 jiang3

definition: Rhode Island, US state/Rhodes, an island of Greece
